## Available Backgrounds

**Gradients**: sunset, ocean, aurora, lavender, coral, mint, rose, twilight, golden, arctic, noir, peach, emerald, vintage

**Solid Colors**: white, black, cream, charcoal, slate, navy, forest, burgundy, mocha

```bash
python collage_maker.py --list-backgrounds
```

---

## Quick Commands

```bash
# Download sample images
python collage_maker.py --download-samples

# Create with background
python collage_maker.py --folder sample_images --style mandala --background sunset

# Social media sizes
python collage_maker.py --folder photos --style grid --width 1080 --height 1080      # Instagram
python collage_maker.py --folder photos --style magazine --width 1200 --height 630   # Facebook

# List all options
python collage_maker.py --list-styles
python collage_maker.py --list-backgrounds
```
